author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hepzibah Trust and Hepzibah Institute of Heritage Conservation are conducting a drawing competition on the theme ‘Clean Chennai’ to mark the seventh anniversary of both the associations.

According to a press release, the competition will be conducted on the trust premises on VOC street, MGR Nagar near K.K. Nagar on February 7, 14{+t}{+h}, 21{+s}{+t}and 28{+t}{+h}for seven different groups in which students will be divided based on their age. The participants will be provided with A3 drawing sheets. They will have to bring the other necessary art supplies.

For further details and registrations, persons interested can contact 2474944 or can send an email todrvjeyaraj@gmail.com.
title: Drawing competition for students
